</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_nft_data","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with NFT data","properties":{"data":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"NFT data if available","type":"object","required":["hash_matches","metadata_hash_matches"],"properties":{"blob":{"type":["string","null"]},"hash_matches":{"type":"boolean"},"metadata_hash_matches":{"type":"boolean"},"metadata_json":{"type":["string","null"]},"mime_type":{"type":["string","null"]}},"title":"NftData"}]}},"title":"GetNftDataResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
